Dr. Walter I, Emery, Page 2, April 18, 1962
Delta College. He didn't, naturally, indicate that he had asked
Art to use his influence to get published. If this latter Is true,
then I surely am not impressed with his approach. However, neither
do X think this should influence us not to run it, if it's a good
article.
Ballard is going to be in Columbus, he told me; so perhaps we can
both talk to him then, if you feel it's desirable.
Well, X think thatâ€™s about it. Thanks again for your note, and for
looking this piece over.
Cordially,
(Mrs.) Betty McKenzie
Publications Editor
